snippet.title: The Case of the Golden Idol | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Dive into the twisted mystery of a family's cursed heirloom. Examine clues and use your powers of deduction to solve a series of grisly murders.

Play The Case of the Golden Idol on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81680948

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 270 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

The Case of the Golden Idol | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
